Description.Text:
Position Situated on the seafront in the central square of the new dock Tonfano, the hotel overlooks Marina di Pietrasanta, thanks to a delightful sun terrace with jacuzzi 7 seats (made ​​in 2010), offering a unique view on the one hand the coast of Versilia and the other the beautiful Apuan.
Restaurant The breakfast buffet with ham, cheese, eggs, toast, sandwiches, homemade bread and full, jam, Nutella, butter, croissants, yogurt, juices, cold milk. Hot drinks are served by waiters however, no self service. The service for lunch and dinner set menu with a choice of three minutes and three seconds, every day in both meat and fish choice. Buffet of appetizers, vegetables both cooked and fresh fruit in season. Each evening our chef, Luke and Christian, will delight the palates of all guests with their homemade desserts.
More Informations The hotel has a children's area. Beach service included only for the month of May and September, an umbrella with a sun bed and two chairs.
